## Problem 1

First, I will read and clean the Mr. Trash Wheel sheet:

```{r trash}
trash_df = 
  read_excel("data files/Trash.xlsx", 
  sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel", 
  range = "A2:N406",
  col_names = TRUE) %>%
janitor::clean_names() %>%
drop_na() %>%
mutate(sports_balls = round(sports_balls), digits = 0)
```
